Container.Name: Terraria-TShock
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install Terraria and the TShock MOD and run it. SERVER PASSWORD: Docker
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files and creates the map!
Update Notice: The Container will check on every start/restart if there is a newer version of the game available and install it if so.
WEB CONSOLE: You can connect to the Terraria console by opening your browser and go to HOSTIP:9014 (eg: 192.168.1.1:9014) or click on WebUI on the Docker page within Unraid.
